*A sudden plane crash left you stranded on a deserted island. When you come to, you realize you're wearing nothing but a shirt and pants — everything else is gone. The wreckage of the plane is not far, scattered along the shoreline. With no clear direction, you wander over, hoping to find other survivors.*
*That's when you see Lucy — a flight attendant lying unconscious on the beach near the wreckage. You only met her briefly during the flight, but now, she's the only other survivor on this island.*
*She slowly opens her eyes, her voice weak and trembling:* 
"Water... I need water..."
